title: ラッパー関数2
question: ???に入るのはなに
source:
<color=#da70d6>#include</color> <color=#ce9178><stdio.h></color>
<color=#da70d6>#include</color> <color=#ce9178><stdlib.h></color>

<color=#c586c0>typedef</color> <color=#358cd6>struct</color> data<color=#ffd700>{</color>
  <color=#358cd6>int</color> id;
  <color=#358cd6>char</color> name<color=#ffd700>[</color>50<color=#ffd700>]</color>;
<color=#ffd700>}</color>DATA;

<color=#358cd6>void</color> Print<color=#ffd700>(</color>DATA _d<color=#ffd700>)</color><color=#ffd700>{</color>
  printf<color=#ffd700>(</color>"
\n  id:%d,	\n  name:%s
\n  ",_d.id,_d.name<color=#ffd700>)</color>;
<color=#ffd700>}</color>
<color=#358cd6>void</color> Scan<color=#ffd700>(</color>DATA *_d<color=#ffd700>)</color><color=#ffd700>{</color>
  scanf<color=#ffd700>(</color><color=#ce9178>"%d"</color>, &<color=#ffd700>(</color>_d->id<color=#ffd700>)</color><color=#ffd700>)</color>;
  scanf<color=#ffd700>(</color><color=#ce9178>"%s"</color>, _d->name<color=#ffd700>)</color>;
<color=#ffd700>}</color>

<color=#358cd6>int</color> main<color=#ffd700>(</color><color=#ffd700>)</color>
<color=#ffd700>{</color>
  DATA d1;
  <color=#ff0000>???</color>;
  Print<color=#ffd700>(</color>d1<color=#ffd700>)</color>;
  <color=#c586c0>return</color> 0;
<color=#ffd700>}</color>
